title: 052 - Folder Of Death
description: On today's show, the guys chat about what they did over the weekend, and Gumpy joins the conversation as they dive into the Folder of Death, with topics today including: what entertainment features need to be added to airports, the Rotten Tomatoes HBO original show bracket, Connor's next level plan to a bring a small business to its knees, how Pat's zoo is continuing to grow, and why not drinking water before bed might end up killing you. Don't forget to send your questions to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. Have a good one, and enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
